original_text: And David longed, and said, Oh that one would give me drink of the water of the well of Bethlehem, which is by the gate!
korean_text: 다윗이 소원하여 이르되 베들레헴 성문 곁 우물 물을 누가 내게 마시게 할까 하매

sentences.original_text: Oh that one would give me drink
sentences.korean_translation: 아, 누가 나에게 마시는 것을 줄까

sentences.original_text: of water of the well of Bethlehem,
